title: Proposal to tweak diana's passive
body:
Currently deals 250+80% ap on every 3rd attack within 3.5 seconds.

I propose that it instead deal 60+20% ap on hit with every 3rd attack dealing double damage (120+40% ap)

pro: more reliable and sustained damage.

con: less burst damage from stacking passive via minions before engage. this technique is mainly limited to early lane phase, is easily predictable, and would be fair to trade some of it's burst in exchange for more available damage at all times.

replies.body:
I think the damage should be a bit higher over 3 attacks if it is more spread out. Sure it is a bit more reliable but you cannot stack it anymore.

Maybe something like 70+20% ap on the two first hits and then 140+40% ap on the third. Not much of a difference, I know, but this way her laning still takes a small hit while her jungling gets buffed.

yea I have to admit in comparison to akali(most similar champion to diana) she's a bit underprivileged. akali's q and r get 100% spellvamp+ her passive is bonus spellvamp, she can enter stealth multiple times in a skirmish, and her dash is always ready with 3 charges where as diana has to land a difficult skillshot to get just 1 extra dash.

I like it. The only thing that Diana needs is a switch between her R and E (knockup). Half the damage the her gap closer would do and maybe add a defensive steroid to her knockup.
